attributes.review: This seriously the most poorly made application! I’ve gotten soo many glitches that I’m surprised I’m able to post this. This app ruined my my phone aka ruined my connection to the WORLD aka I have no friends aka this app DESTROYED ,OBLITERATED, and CRUSHED my life, hopes and dreams. The amount of anxiety I’ve accumulated after downloading this is ASTRONOMICAL! My mind has been tainted by this app as well as my well being. I hope you’re not happy...
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!

attributes.review: This app is trash, and trump is a dirty pig. Also save Barron trump from his horrendous father.
attributes.userName: you dont want to know me
attributes.title: Trump is a racist.

attributes.review: When i first tried to get this app, it took 40 FREAKING DAYS TO EVEN DOWNLOAD?!??!??  and once i downloaded it first said “ don’t be shy... be racist and eat like a pig and and wear a wig like me ✨l o l ✨ - Trump...... ARE YOU KIDDING ME?!? Once I logged in, my phone kept freezing and i had to restart MY WHOLE PHONE. And so randomly i had multiple random virtual cockroaches walk across the screen. AND SPIDERS TOO. THIS APP GAVE AND FOREVER WILL GIVE ME PTSD. ( update: i am now in a psychiatric hospital for a week for all the mental illness this app have gave me) Worst experience EVER
attributes.title: THE WORSE, HORRENDOUS APP EVER!!!!

attributes.review: After waiting 36 hours for this app to finally download, I started using it and two days later started getting fraud alerts on my apple account. BEWARE! My cards were frozen, money missing from my bank account - you would think someone who’s so good with money wouldn’t need to steal from the American people yet...here we are.
attributes.title: Info stolen 🤬

attributes.review: so basically this app gave me an aneurysm💫. they hacked my tinder account and matched me with donny boi 11 times🌝💫💔. my refrigerator started running and they said i better go catch it smh😖
attributes.title: who in da hellllll our da muffins in da freeza 💞✨

attributes.review: This thing literally crashed my phone 18 times and it doesn’t even work right. I finally got it to open by shutting down all the other apps. There is a bug if you have any other app open, this thing crashes your whole phone. Once I finally opened it and i gave it my info, my phone has been blowing up with spam. I think they sold my info or something because all kinds of spam callers are calling and emailing me. And I tried to unsubscribe and that didn’t work either, I just kept getting more spam, even from random porn sites just hacking into my phone and my computer and even my email got hacked. I think my identity may have gotten stolen too because a day after I got this app, my bank froze my bank account because of suspicious activity on my account. Apparently there were charges made on my credit card from Mexico and I live in South Carolina. And never even been to Mexico. Apparently the wall we built doesn’t stop identity theft.
attributes.title: The worse app ever!

attributes.review: I really dislike this app and I am very disappointed I love you trump I am a true supporter I believe in ALL!!! Of your beliefs but this app is just not good I love my apps and I’m quite frankly good at technology so I know this app is just completely useless TRUMP 2020 YOU CAN DO BETTER <3~ Betty jones
attributes.title: Years worst app!!!! If I could rate it a negative I would<3-Betty Jones

attributes.review: After 78 hours of suffering my mom fell in a hole and broke her legs then my dog got run over my phone blew up and the docters amputated all my limbs afterwords so if you dont want this to happen please don’t download the app
attributes.title: Don’t download

attributes.review: After downloading this app I quickly learned that it was trying to access my clipboard data, network information, contacts,...etc.
attributes.title: Spyware...

attributes.review: Tried to download the app today and it took 6 hours just to open and then when it opened a chinese message popped up, but I can read Chinese so I copy and pasted it into google translate and it said that it took all of my information. So what I’m trying to say is this app should not be allowed on the App Store.
attributes.title: Terrible app
